query: I need articles published in Neurology or Nature in 2018, authored by Nils Henninger, focusing on Intracerebral Haemorrhages, particularly those that mention: Compare hematoma volume, hematoma expansion and clinical outcome in novel oral anticoagulant related and warfarin related intracerebral haemorrhages.

keywords.Semantic Query: Compare hematoma volume, hematoma expansion and clinical outcome in novel oral anticoagulant related and warfarin related intracerebral haemorrhages.

ground_truth_papers: Comparison of Clinical and Radiological Characteristics of Warfarin versus Novel Oral Anticoagulant Related Intracerebral Hemorrhages.
